detail_desc: Loose-knit jumper in tape yarn with a wide neckline, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Longer at the back.
Loose-knit jumper in tape yarn with a wide neckline, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Longer at the back.
Loose-knit jumper in tape yarn with a wide neckline, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Longer at the back.
Double-knit jumper with a wide, lace-trimmed, ribbed V-neck. Dropped shoulders, wide sleeves with close-fitting, ribbed cuffs, and a ribbed hem.

V-neck playsuit in softly draping Tencel™ lyocell denim with buttons down the front and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Covered elastication and a tie belt at the waist, side pockets and short, wide legs.

V-neck playsuit in softly draping Tencel™ lyocell denim with buttons down the front and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Covered elastication and a tie belt at the waist, side pockets and short, wide legs.
Top in satin with a slight sheen. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Lined at the top.
Long kaftan in an airy jacquard weave made from recycled polyester with a V-neck front and back and two-part drawstring at the front. Unlined.
Calf-length dress in a patterned crêpe weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front, short sleeves and slits at the front. Unlined.

Short parka in washed cotton twill with a soft brushed finish. Drawstring hood, a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and flap front pockets with a press-stud. Drawstring at the waist, and cuffs with a press-stud fastening. Slightly longer and rounded at the back. Unlined.

Short parka in washed cotton twill with a soft brushed finish. Drawstring hood, a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and flap front pockets with a press-stud. Drawstring at the waist, and cuffs with a press-stud fastening. Slightly longer and rounded at the back. Unlined.
Shorts in a viscose and linen weave. High, elasticated, drawstring waist with a frill trim, a fake fly and diagonal side pockets.
Metal rings that spell the word HOPE. Three of the rings are adjustable in size.

Calf-length skirt in soft, patterned cotton twill with a lightly brushed finish. High waist with a wide, double-layered waistband that has gathers all round for added volume. Concealed zip in one side with a hook-and-eye fastening at the top. Unlined.

Lined, non-wired triangle bikini top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Metal fastener at the back. The polyester content of the bikini top is recycled.

Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist and cutaway coverage at the back. The polyester content of the bikini bottoms is recycled.

Sleeveless, knee-length dress in pleated jersey with a small stand-up collar, V-shaped opening at the front with ties at the top, and an elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.

5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details. Regular waist, a zip fly and button, and skinny legs. Trouser chain with a carabiner hook and keyring.

Long, finely-pleated dress in softly draping jersey. Round neckline with narrow, covered elastication and an open back with adjustable lacing. Seam at the waist with narrow, covered elastication and small, decorative frills. Gently flared skirt with a high slit in one side. Unlined.

Long, finely-pleated dress in softly draping jersey. Round neckline with narrow, covered elastication and an open back with adjustable lacing. Seam at the waist with narrow, covered elastication and small, decorative frills. Gently flared skirt with a high slit in one side. Unlined.

Fully lined swimsuit with a V-neck at the back, a small opening with ties at the front and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and flounce trims at the top and around the legs.
Short, rib-knit top with narrow shoulder straps, a V-neck and embroidery on the front.

Boxy-style jumper in a soft knit with a small stand-up collar, low dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves with close-fitting cuffs.

Trousers in a stretch cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, zip fly and press-stud, diagonal side pockets with smaller inner pockets, welt back pockets and flap leg pockets with concealed press-studs. Legs with shaping seams at the knees for added mobility and an elastic drawstring at the hems. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the thighs and knees to create a comfortable, straight silhouette.
